subcomponents.name: ehr
subcomponents.title: EHR IM
subcomponents.description: The information model of the openEHR EHR.

subcomponents.name: common
subcomponents.title: Common IM
subcomponents.description: Information model containing common concepts, including the archetype-enabling `LOCATABLE` class, party references, audits and attestations, change control, and authored resources.

subcomponents.name: data_structures
subcomponents.title: Data Structures IM
subcomponents.description: Information model of data structures, incuding a powerful model of time-series data.

subcomponents.name: data_types
subcomponents.title: Data Types IM
subcomponents.description: Information model of data types, including quantities, date/times, plain and coded text, time specification, multimedia and URIs.

subcomponents.name: support
subcomponents.title: Support IM
subcomponents.description: Support model defining identifiers, assumed types, and terminology interface specification used in the rest of the IMs.

subcomponents.name: integration
subcomponents.title: Integration IM
subcomponents.description: Information model for representing legacy data is a free-form Entry type for implementing integration solutions.

subcomponents.name: ehr_extract
subcomponents.title: EHR Extract IM
subcomponents.description: The information model of the EHR Extract, which is a serilialisation of content from an EHR.
